column2: ENGLISH
I cannot afford to pay my magistrates and my debts to the lower classes are dangerously high. The peasants of [Root.GetName] are now completely disregarding my divine right to rule!
The peasants of [Root.GetName] are slowly starting to respect my rule again. I should never let my treasury go negative!
Due to my lack of funds to pay my sheriffs and magistrates with, a Thieves' Guild has been established in [Root.GetName].
Thanks to my wise Stewardship of §Y[Root.GetName]§!, the local Thieves' Guild has been eradicated.
My acute budget deficit has allowed a Smugglers' Ring to appear in [Root.GetName].
Thanks to my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike outside the city gates.
Thanks to the [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.

Thanks to the retinue stationed in the [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.

Thanks to the temple guards of [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.
My underfunded sheriffs have allowed a large band of robbers to rise in [Root.GetName]. They are too craven to attack my castles though.
With my great Martial ability, I have rounded up and executed the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!
Due to the [target_wonder.GetName], and my great Martial ability, the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§! have been rounded up and executed!
The retinue stationed in the [target_wonder.GetName] have helped me to round up and execute the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!
The temple guards of [target_wonder.GetName] have helped me to round up and execute the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!
And we can't do anything about it...
Thank the Lord!
They have not stolen any of my property yet
It is good to be the [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!
I don't see how this matters to me?
I am such a great [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]
I am safe inside my walls..
Call me [Root.County.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] the Great!
Allah is merciful!
